EmailTemplate.subject: Regional Youth Board!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi potential Regional Youth Board members!
Just confirming that our first meeting is on the 5th April from 11-2pm in Reading (3rd floor of the library!!!)
If you haven't booked your place yet please do so now by clicking this link:-
https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/regional-youth-board-tickets-23091017856
We would really love to have you on the board.
Please also let me know if you want to be on the board but cannot make this meeting and we can keep your name on the list! if not we will have to assume you are no longer interested in this position!
Also, you might have noticed that we are running an Easter competition to tell us your NCS story in a creative way. It doesn't have to take you long at all- write a letter, a poem, draw a picture or make a video to showcase what NCS meant to you and why other young people should do it! You could win a beats pill speaker or over Â£100 in shopping vouchers!
The deadline has been eggs-tended to next Friday (1st April) so please consider completing this google form and entering!
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/17wuR_hJriYF8vsmaQ7gcHbIiUbFyICQlo7G18_tWwUU/viewform
Thanks so much!
Amy
